title: AstraZeneca signs $18.5b deal for next-gen slimming drugs
summary: Big pharma AstraZeneca partners with Hong Kong’s CSPC to develop next-gen weight management drugs worldwide. Managing your weight is possible without complicated schedules, multiple pills or daily injections. That’s the vision British-Swedish pharma giant AstraZeneca is chasing with its latest move: a massive $18.5 billion licensing deal with Hong Kong-based CSPC Pharmaceutical Group to develop […] The post AstraZeneca signs $18.5b deal for next-gen slimming drugs appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Kyle Umipig
